name: kui-shell
description: This is the monorepo for Kui, the hybrid command-line/GUI electron-based Kubernetes tool

scripts.build:electron-for-development: npm run build:configure && npm run compile && for i in plugins/*; do if [ -d $i/node_modules ]; then (cd build/plugins/`basename $i` && rm -rf node_modules && cp -a ../../../$i/node_modules .); fi; done
scripts.postinstall: npm run build:hoist && npm run build:electron-for-development
scripts.watch:webpack: rm -rf clients/default/dist/webpack && mkdir -p clients/default/dist/webpack/css && (cd clients/default/dist/webpack/css && for i in ../../../../../packages/app/web/css/*; do ln -s $i; done && for i in ../../../theme/css/*; do ln -s $i; done && ln -s ../../../theme/icons && ln -s ../../../theme/images); if [ -f clients/default/theme/config.json ]; then echo "linking config-dev.json"; (cd node_modules/@kui-shell/settings && rm -f config-dev.json && cp ../../../clients/default/theme/config.json config-dev.json); fi && export KUI_MONO_HOME=$(cd ./ && pwd); webpack-dev-server --progress --config packages/webpack/webpack.config.js
